metadata.title: CVE-2023-50782 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the python-cryptography package. This issue may allow aremote attacker to decrypt captured messages in TLS servers that use RSAkey exchanges, which may lead to exposure of confidential or sensitivedata.

criterions.comment: python-cryptography package in bionic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-01-18').
openssl package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
openssl1.0 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
nodejs package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
edk2 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
